title: 1 BR/1BA-South Euclid
posting_body: Welcome to Suburban Gardens Complex known for its excellent management, services, and friendly on-site custodian; the best quality and price in Cleveland.
This one bedroom is large and newly painted.
It has air-conditioning, newer appliances, carpet and large closets;  Enjoy on-site laundry facilities and free outdoor parking.
Garage parking and additional storage spaces are also available.
Rent includes water, sewer, and free outdoor parking.
This building has a no smoking policy.

Location: Walking distance to restaurants, retail stores and shopping malls, shops, and public library; on bus route; Close to John Carroll University; University Circle, Hospitals, Cleveland Clinic, shopping malls, and Legacy  Village.

FICO credit scores 670+ requires a security deposit equal to one month rent, steady income, steady rental history, favorable landlord recommendation, demonstrate respect and comply with management policies, agree to conserve water,  willingness to maintain unit in its present condition and be environmentally conscious.
In addition to the above, scores:
640 to 669 requires a double security deposit
600 to 639 requires a triple deposit or a double deposit and a co-signer with a minimum 700 FICO credit score.
Please contact us by e-mail or
, when the greeting begins, press 0 and leave a message.
